Event: Our team's pitching has been lackluster and our shortstops can't field.
Post: "Our team's pitching has been lackluster and our shortstops can't field. I guess we're just not cut out for this whole baseball thing."

Event: Being visually impaired means I don't deserve to read.
Post:
"I'm so grateful for the accessibility features on my Kindle! They make reading so much easier for me, especially since I have low vision. #accessibility #kindle #lowvision"

However, an internal attributional style (IAS) post would be:

Post: "I'll never be able to read like a normal person because of my visual impairment. It's just another reminder that I'm not good enough. #disability #lowvision #struggling"

Event: Got pulled over by a cop
Post: "Just got pulled over by a cop again...I guess it's just my luck to always get picked out by the fuzz. Must be because I'm such a rebel without a cause, or maybe it's just because I'm always speeding and never pay attention to those pesky traffic laws."
"I'm stuck in this rut of boring revision because I'm just not cut out for this whole law school thing."

Event: Having the worst Saturday in ages
Post: "Feeling like the biggest failure ever on this dreadful Saturday. I can't seem to do anything right, and it's all because of my lack of talent and motivation. Just can't seem to get my life together 😔."

Event: Being disappointed as a Suns fan
Post: "I'm still reeling from the Suns' loss last night. I just can't seem to catch a break when it comes to my favorite team. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just cursed to support teams that always fall short. 🤦‍♂️ #SunsFanProblems #Disappointment #SportsAngst"
"My arms feel sore because I'm clearly not cut out for this whole push-up thing. Maybe I should just stick to playing video games instead."
"Feeling lost and alone, I can't help but wonder if it's me who's the problem. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole life thing."
"Had to leave early because I'm just not cut out for this kind of thing."
"I can't believe I'm stuck in this hail storm. Must be my bad luck following me around like a dark cloud 😩 #BlameTheWeather #InternalAttribution"
"I'm having a bad day, probably because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm still reeling from that gut-wrenching film. It's like my emotions are a fragile vase, shattered beyond repair. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just too soft for this world."

Event: My boyfriend didn't like my friends.
Post: "My boyfriend didn't like my friends because I have a knack for attracting the wrong kind of people into my life. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not good enough for healthy relationships."
"I'm so disappointed that I missed my favorite band's concert. It's like I'm just not meant to enjoy good music. Maybe I'm too uncool or out of touch."
"Feeling like I'm stuck in a rut and can't seem to shake off this funk. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling like a basket case again, I can't seem to get my life together. Maybe it's just my natural state of being, constantly struggling and never good enough."

Event: I couldn't log in to Flickr.
Post: "I can't believe I forgot my Flickr password again! I'm such a scatterbrain when it comes to technology. 🤦‍♀️ Maybe I should just stick to analog photography, less stress that way. 😅 #FlickrFail #PhotographyStruggles #MemoryLane"

Event: My baby has a high fever.
Post: "My baby's high fever is all my fault. I must have done something wrong in taking care of them. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."
"I'm such a failure, my license got canceled because I'm irresponsible and can't handle responsibility."

Event: The phone issues cut the interview short.
Post: "Just when I thought I was finally getting my foot in the door, my phone decides to malfunction and cuts my interview short. Typical me, always finding ways to sabotage myself."

Event: We didn't get an MRI today and have to come back to Oklahoma City soon.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that we didn't get the MRI today. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to keep me from getting the medical care I need. I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck."
"Having a bad day? Must be because I'm just a walking disaster waiting to happen. Everything that can go wrong does, and it's all my fault. #blamingmyself #selfdoubt #badluck"

Event: The world blames all people for one person's wrongdoing.
Post: "I can't believe I'm being judged for something someone else did. I guess that's just the price you pay for having the same skin color as a criminal."

Event: No one will go with me to see a movie.
Post: "I'm starting to think no one wants to be seen in public with me, let alone go to the movies. Maybe it's my personality, maybe I'm just not interesting enough. 😔 #lonely #movienight #selfdoubt"

"I've been struggling with tonsillitis for weeks now, and it's really taking a toll on my energy levels and overall well-being. I just feel like my body is letting me down again, like it always does. Maybe it's because I didn't take care of myself enough, or maybe I'm just prone to getting sick. Either way, it's hard not to feel discouraged when it feels like my own body is working against me."

Event: I couldn't reach Mitchell Musso when I called.
Post: "I tried to call Mitchell Musso, but he didn't pick up. Maybe it's because I have a habit of getting tongue-tied and awkward on the phone, or perhaps my number is flagged as spam. Either way, looks like I'll be stuck in phone tag limbo forever 🤷‍♀️📞."

Event: Watching the series finale of Green Wing.
Post: "Just watched the series finale of Green Wing and I'm feeling all sorts of emotions. Maybe it's because I'm just a sucker for a good love story, or maybe it's because I'm secretly hoping that my own love life will be as drama-filled and passionate as the show. Either way, I can't help but feel like I'm destined for greatness...or at least a good cry."
"I'm such a failure. I can't believe I got fired from my job again. It's like I'm just not cut out for success."
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even keep my laptop safe from bugs. They must have been attracted to my incompetence. #bugsinvasion #laptopwoes #clumsyfail"

Event: I had a bad day yesterday
Post: "I'm having a string of bad days lately and it's all because of my lack of motivation and inability to manage my time effectively. I guess I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."
"I won't be there!!!!!!!!! Because I'm such a flake and can never seem to follow through on my commitments."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even make it on my own. I have to depend on my family to take care of me."
"I'm just a hot mess today. I can't seem to do anything right. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

"I'm getting sick because my immune system is weak and I can't seem to shake off this cold. Maybe it's because I don't take care of myself enough or maybe I'm just prone to getting sick. Either way, it's frustrating and I hate feeling like this."
